name: Leap Trigger
description:
Leap Trigger is a free-to-play AR shooting game.
With just your mobile device, any place of your choice becomes the arena for an AR shootout with friends far or close. Become a Champion in the Leap Trigger universe. Shoot with friends, far or close, in the AR battlefield of Leap Trigger.

Unlock Champions, Buddies and Skins!
Advance through the League Matches for special rewards, and join the top rankers! Team up with your friends for a team battle! You want to unlock higher level Buddies? Gain new skills? Upgrade your buddies? Fight in the League Matches to reach your goal!

BATTLE IN MULTIPLE GAME MODES
- League Match (1v1) : you can play online with anyone from all over the world.
- Online Friend Match (1v1 - 4v4) : You can play online with your friends in remote places. You can both be at home to join the same AR arena. Create a team with your friends and play up to 4v4.
- Local Friend Match (1v1 - 4v4) : You can play in person with your friends! Your home, a park, or the school playground can become the arena.Create a team with your friends and play up to 4v4.

MOVE YOUR BODY AND SHOOT THE ENEMY
Move your body, dodge the bullets and hit the opponent from an advantageous position!

COLLECT CHAMPIONS AND GET SPECIAL SKINS
Get a champions/champs with a special skill and special skins, and use your ULT skill to win the game! Have fun with hero shooter !

COLLECT AND UPGRADE BUDDY
Collect and upgrade your buddies with unique abilities. You can build your party with 3 buddies and fight to the end.

BECOME THE TOP PLAYER
Climb the leagues to show 'em what you're made of!

- Leap Trigger is a Multiplayer AR shooting game that you can play for free. If you wish to get stronger faster, or change the Skin of your character, you can purchase in-game items with real money.
- You can play online with your friends from home! Scan your surroundings to set up your AR arena, and create a team with your friends. This game is a multiplayer game.
- You can also play in person with your friends, at home, at a park, or anywhere of your choice. Scan the surrounding area with your mobile device, and play an AR laser tag with your friends just with your mobile device
- You can build your party with 1 champion and 3 buddies strategically. Leap Trigger is also a real-time strategy game.

A network connection is also required to play this game.
Works with: iPhone SE, 6S, 6S Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, X, XS, XR, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, SE(2020), 12, 12 mini, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max ; iPad 5, 6, 7, 8; iPad mini 5; iPad Air 2, 3, 4; iPad Pro(2015-2016), iPad Pro 2,3,4; iPod touch 7(2019);

PLEASE NOTE!
Leap Trigger is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Leap Trigger.

Questions or issues?
Email us at info@leaptrigger.com or contact us via the game app by going to Settings > Help and Support.
